       Hell Beast and his small army of Predacons regrouped on the outskirts 
of battle, shy one arachnid. "Where is Tarantulas damn it?" Hell Beast 
bellowed at the others.
       Aracnia steped up. "We encountered some Allience fighter jets on our 
way here. They somehow magically know where our base is and are going to 
attack it even though they dont know where it is, or how its defended. He 
went to go and man the defense systems."
       He nodded. Zardus was such a tempermental bitch sometimes. "ALright 
Predacons, pick a target on the CF and blast it to smitherines!"
       With a crack of missle fire, the Predacons dispersed and began the 
assult.

       He entered the base quickly with the blast doors slamming down as 
Tarantulas ran. He entered the bridge and looked around. The bridge was 
pratically alien to him. He raced around looking for the defense system 
computer.
       As he sat down, he brought online the defense grid and was pleased 
with what he saw. the compliment of weapons at his disposal made Tarantulas 
think twice about if he should just take the base over for himself. 
       An EMP Pulse Canon was what he was rather pleased with. One direct hit 
to one of those jets with this would incompasitate them definetly. The 
autoguns were activated, the half dozen or so missle turrets came to life, a 
shiled rose, and the laser canons were charged and ready.
       Flare, Scrap, Supernov, Vycir, and Slasys' signitures came up on the 
scanner. Tarantulas' claws flew over the control panle as the weapons 
targeted the squad. The sun was getting ready to disappear behinde the 
distant mountians and when it did the light show would begin.

       With a crack of Energon lighting, the six bots landed at the north end 
of the CF. Obviously the desnse grid would be up, but if they could make it 
inside and turn it off then the other bots would reduce the ship to ruble.

--part1_56.76f3916.27c293bf_boundary
